headline: Chehalis Welcomes First Xfinity Store
summary: CHEHALIS, Wash., January 15, 2026--Comcast today announced the opening of its first Xfinity Store in Chehalis located in the Twin City Town Center West at 1433 NW Louisiana Ave., Chehalis, WA. The new storefront features an interactive design that provides local residents with a new, convenient location to experience the complete line of Xfinity products and services, including Xfinity Mobile, or discuss their business technology needs with a Comcast Business expert.

headline: NBCUniversal strategically leans into sports as it prepares for 'Legendary February'
summary: NBCUniversal's calling card used to be "Must See TV," but the modern media world has pushed the company in a new direction, led by live sports.

headline: Why NBCUniversal is all in on sports
summary: On Feb. 6, the 2026 Winter Olympics will kick off a flurry of NBC Sports programming that the network is branding as "Legendary February." The lineup, which includes Super Bowl LX, Winter Olympics and the NBA All-Star Game, signals a recent strategy shift inside NBCUniversal. CNBC's Alex Sherman breaks down why the media company has chosen to go all in on sports amid an evolving media ecosystem.

headline: Is Comcast (CMCSA) Pricing Offer A Genuine Opportunity After Multi Year Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether Comcast's current share price offers real value or just looks cheap on the surface, you are not alone. The stock recently closed at US$28.42, with returns of 1.9% over 7 days, 0.7% over 30 days, a 3.8% decline year to date, and a 13.5% decline over the last year, alongside 12.5% and 28.1% declines across the past 3 and 5 years. Recent coverage of Comcast has focused on how investors are weighing its role as a major US telecom and media company against a share...
